tableInfo.caption: 待修信息综合查询
tableInfo.sql: select T_XT_JLDW.mc as dw,BH,JH,T_JH.MC as JHMC,XH,A.JX,A.Sl,A.ZL,A.Jwh,A.Ccrq,a.ysrq,a.zsmn,a.zsmxs,a.zfxcs,a.fxcs FANXCS,a.fxrq,a.zjsj,a.zjdw,a.zjr ,a.cjsj,a.cjdw,a.cjr,a.pgr,a.bz,CKDM,T_JH_JX.MC AS JXMC, to_char(A.RKRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD')RKRQ ,ADD_MONTHS(A.YFRQ,12*A.YFQX) YFQZ, A.YJ,to_char(A.YFRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD')YFRQ,A.YFQX,A.HCLB,T_XT_HCLB.MC HCLBMC,V_DW.MC CXDWMC,A.FJH,A.GZXX,CASE WHEN A.PFZT=0 THEN '未批复' when a.pfzt=1 then '已批复' else '其它'end PFMC,SBBH,SBRQ,JZRQ,SCCJ,SYSJ,T_XT_ZD.MC ZDMC from T_CK_DX A left join T_JH on T_JH.id=A.Jh AND T_JH.JX=A.JX left join T_JH_JX on T_JH_JX.id=A.jx left join T_XT_HCLB ON T_XT_HCLB.ID=A.HCLB left join T_XT_JLDW on T_XT_JLDW.ID = T_JH.DW LEFT JOIN V_DW ON V_DW.ID=A.CXDW LEFT JOIN T_XT_ZDFJ ON T_XT_ZDFJ.DWID=A.DWID AND T_XT_ZDFJ.MC=A.FJH LEFT JOIN T_XT_ZD ON T_XT_ZD.DWID=T_XT_ZDFJ.DWID AND T_XT_ZD.ZDID=T_XT_ZDFJ.ZDID where 1=1 and A.xz='0' ORDER BY A.JX

tableInfo.caption: 送修信息综合查询
tableInfo.sql: SELECT JH,T_JH.MC JHMC,T_XT_JLDW.MC JLDW,XH,FJH,ZL,A.JX,T_JH_JX.MC JXMC,CKDM,T_XT_CK.MC CKMC,FHD,CXDW,V_DW.MC CXDWMC,SXRQ,SXLB, T_SX_LB.MC SXLBMC,HTBH,A.SL,ZYLB,GZYY,JXQN,JXQXS,T_XT_HCLB.MC HCMC,CASE WHEN A.PFZT=0 THEN '未批复' when a.pfzt=1 then '已批复' else '其它'end PFMC, SBBH,SBRQ,JZRQ,SCCJ,SYSJ FROM T_CK_SX A left join T_JH on T_JH.id=A.Jh AND T_JH.JX=A.JX left join T_JH_JX on T_JH_JX.id=A.jx left join T_XT_HCLB ON T_XT_HCLB.ID=A.HCLB left join T_XT_JLDW on T_XT_JLDW.ID = T_JH.DW LEFT JOIN T_XT_CK ON T_XT_CK.DWID=A.DWID AND T_XT_CK.CKID=A.CKDM LEFT JOIN V_DW ON V_DW.ID=A.CXDW LEFT JOIN T_SX_LB ON T_SX_LB.ID=A.SXLB where 1=1 and A.SL>0 AND A.XZ=0 ORDER BY A.JX

tableInfo.caption: 综合查询
tableInfo.sql: select T_XT_JLDW.mc as dw,A.BH,A.JH,T_JH.MC as JHMC,A.XH,A.JX,A.Sl DXSL, to_char(A.RKRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD')DXRKRQ,B.SL SXSL,to_char(B.SXRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD')SXRQ, C.SL XFSL,to_char(C.RKRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD') XFRKRQ,to_char(C.XFRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD')XFRQ,D.SL DBFSL,D.RQ DBFRQ,A.CKDM,T_JH_JX.MC AS JXMC,ADD_MONTHS(A.YFRQ,12*A.YFQX) YFQZ, A.YJ,to_char(A.YFRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD')YFRQ,A.YFQX,A.HCLB,T_XT_HCLB.MC HCLBMC,V_DW.MC CXDWMC,A.FJH,A.GZXX, CASE WHEN D.XZ=0 THEN '待报废' WHEN A.XZ=0 THEN '待修中' WHEN B.XZ=0 AND B.SL>0 THEN '已送修' WHEN B.XZ=1 THEN '已退修' when C.XZ=0 THEN '已返回'else '其他' end HCZT,A.SCCJ,A.SYSJ, c.bzz bzmc,a.zl,C.Hl,a.jwh,a.ccrq,a.ysrq,a.bz from T_CK_DX A left join T_JH on T_JH.id=A.Jh AND T_JH.JX=A.JX left join T_JH_JX on T_JH_JX.id=A.jx left join T_XT_HCLB ON T_XT_HCLB.ID=A.HCLB left join T_XT_JLDW on T_XT_JLDW.ID = T_JH.DW LEFT JOIN V_DW ON V_DW.ID=A.CXDW LEFT JOIN T_CK_SX B ON B.JH=A.JH AND B.JX=A.JX AND B.XH=A.XH AND A.BH=B.DXBH LEFT JOIN T_CK_XF C on C.JH=A.JH AND C.JX=A.JX AND C.XH=A.XH AND A.BH=C.DXBH LEFT JOIN T_CK_DXZBF D on D.JH=A.JH AND D.JX=A.JX AND D.XH=A.XH where 1=1 ORDER BY A.JX,A.JH,A.XH

tableInfo.caption: 报废信息查询
tableInfo.sql: SELECT A.JX,JH,XH,BFYJ,BFYY,RKRQ,TZS,CKDM,ZL,A.SL,HCLB,BFRQ,T_XT_JLDW.mc as JLdw,T_JH_JX.MC AS JXMC,T_JH.MC JHMC,T_XT_HCLB.MC HCLBMC FROM T_CK_BFK A left join T_JH on T_JH.id=A.Jh AND T_JH.JX=A.JX left join T_JH_JX on T_JH_JX.id=A.jx left join T_XT_HCLB ON T_XT_HCLB.ID=A.HCLB left join T_XT_JLDW on T_XT_JLDW.ID = T_JH.DW where 1=1 AND A.SL>0 ORDER BY A.JX
